import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios' const Profile =()=>{ let id = localStorage.getItem('id'); //view user info const [data, setData] = useState({}); const fetchProfile = async () => { const response = await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/get/' + id) const myProfile = await response.json(); setData(myProfile); console.log(myProfile) } return( <>
